String.string: The Last Thing We Wanted to See
Be careful. No one knows what might come out.
Do you think the argons are really in league with the cultists?

Use the Seal Deactivation Scroll you received from Elleon and remove the Eldritch Seal.
(Only normal mode will advance quests.)

Eliminate the creatures inside the Chamber of Wonder.
(Only normal mode will advance quests.)
